title_en: MysIDC 8.4.9: Death Rate by State, Administrative District & Sex
title_ms: MysIDC 8.4.9: Kadar Kematian mengikut Negeri, Daerah Pentadbiran & Jantina
description_en: Annual death rate by state, administrative district and sex
description_ms: Kadar kematian tahunan mengikut negeri, daerah pentadbiran dan jantina

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to 01-01 since the data is at annual frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD ditetapkan sebagai 01-01 kerana data berfrekuensi tahunan

fields.name: district
fields.description_en: [Categorical] One of 156 administrative districts, or the whole state/country ('overall')
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Satu daripada 156 daerah pentadbiran, atau kesuluruhan negeri/negara ('overall')

fields.name: sex
fields.description_en: [Categorical] Either both sexes ('both'), male ('male') or female ('female')
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Sama ada kedua-dua jantina ('both'), lelaki ('male') atau perempuan ('female')
